price: 68. Les transmito el mensaje de mi Señor y soy para ustedes un fiel consejero.
arabic: أُبَلِّغُكُمۡ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّي وَأَنَا۠ لَكُمۡ نَاصِحٌ أَمِينٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: uballighukum risālāti rabbī wa-anā lakum nāṣiḥun amīnun
